name: jaw crusher
overview: Jaw crushers are mostly used in primary cruhsing, crushign raw stones & rocks to small ones. It can aslso used in tertiary crushing. it depends on the models. SBM design & produce series of jaw crusher and they well meet customers' different requirements.
application: Jaw crusher is widely used in various mining &construction materials processing industries, such as granite, marble, basalt, limestone, quartz, cobble, iron ore, copper ore, and some other mineral &rocks.
